title: What is the interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for a man?

preview.html: Seeing a sheep in a man’s dream is one of the pets that people benefit from. As for seeing a sheep in a dream, it would be good to have other fodder behind it, and in the following lines we will explain the details to reassure the reader and not distract attention between the different interpretations. Read with us to discover everything new. Seeing a sheep in a dream for a man. Seeing fear in a dream for a man indicates righteousness and piety in his life. And with others, which makes him popular among men until his Lord is satisfied with him because of his soft heart. Seeing a sheep in a dream leads to an almost complete realization of his desire to travel abroad to work on developing himself so that he will obtain a major promotion and become prominent in society and distinguished in his field, and he will be safe and comfortable in his field. His life is a new home. Seeing a sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a sheep in a dream for a man indicates the many benefits and profits that he will obtain from his resurrection with a group of works that will achieve many successes in the coming period and become famous. The following days. Seeing a pregnancy in a dream indicates his imminent marriage contract with the girl to whom his heart is attached, and pregnancy in the dreamer’s sleep symbolizes his liberation from enemies and competitors and he is on his way to achieving his goals and achieving them on earth. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the world. Al-Arabi, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing a sheep in a dream for a married man. Seeing a sheep in a dream for a married man indicates a happy married life in which he will live with his wife in the coming days after the end of the tribulations and judgments that occurred between them because of the haters and those dissatisfied with them. . Long. Seeing a sheep in a dream leads the dreamer to obtain a suitable job opportunity that improves his financial income so that he can meet the demands of his children so that he can be one of the richest on earth. Seeing a slaughtered sheep in a dream for a man. Seeing the slaughtering of a sheep in a dream for a man indicates the good news that he will learn in the coming days, and slaughtering A sheep in a dream for a sleeper means giving and donating to the poor and needy to help them until his lifetime. The Lord is pleased with him. Seeing a lamb in a dream symbolizes good events that will happen to him in the coming life, and slaughtering a sheep in the dreamer’s sleep means that he will get rid of the debts that plagued his life in the previous days. Seeing a dead sheep in a dream for a manSeeing a dead sheep in a dream for a man means Being far from his religion, avoiding good deeds and following temptations and temptations forbidden by God (the Most High). Seeing a small sheep in a dream for a man. Seeing a small sheep in a dream for a man indicates his success in practical life and achieving what he desired in the past. Following the lamb in the dreamer’s vision indicates morals. The high status and piety that he enjoys among men, and the small sheep in the dreamer’s sleep symbolizes the transformations that will satisfy his future life. Seeing a man buying a sheep in a dream Seeing a man buying a sheep in a dream leads him to find out the news of his wife’s pregnancy in the next few days, which he has been waiting for

title: Interpretation of dough in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of dough in a dream: “Oh, advise me to see me, if it translates into a vision.” Dreams are what we see in a dream every night until we wake up, and we see when we sleep at any time. In most of them, they are “self-talk” and self-talk comes from Satan, including the ordinary dreams that we dream, and dreams can also be real visions from Almighty God, if they feel that they are a message from God, and we remember their events after a while, and in this Today's article from Encyclopedia presents the opinions of the leading imams of dream interpretation on the interpretation of a dream about dough. Interpretation of dough in a dream There are many interpretations of dreams, but the correct interpretations come from the leading imams of dream interpretation, and in this article we list the interpretations of the most important scholars of dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about dough in a dream by Ibn Siriniri The scholar Ibn Sirin gives the interpretation of seeing dough, especially fermented dough, in a dream. It indicates the money that the viewer will earn from his halal trade or cooperation with his friends. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is preparing barley dough. This indicates that this person is honest and that he will rise to the highest positions and reach the peak of his success. And if a person sees in a dream that the dough has not risen. This indicates that he is suffering from financial hardship. If one sees in a dream that the dough is spoiled. This indicates that he is spending his money in the wrong place, so this is a warning to him, and he must review himself and be honest. The consumption of dough depends on its taste. If the taste of the dough is sweet and delicious, this indicates that the fortuneteller is in a hurry and that these matters will succeed, but they must be described with patience and careful thought.But if one sees that they are cutting the dough on a set of logs. This indicates that he is very wise in spending money. Dough in a dream for the real Imam. If the dreamer sees dough in his dream, this indicates that he is very good, and this person will get the diet soon. Dough in a dream also indicates good news about happiness, joy and pleasure in life. The dreamer will obtain many irreplaceable opportunities. Interpretation of dough in a dream for a single woman. Among the ancient interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin in interpreting dough in an unmarried woman’s dream is that bread in a dream indicates abundant food and almost joy. If an unmarried girl sees it in her dream They make dough from barley, wheat, or fenugreek, and if this dough is fermented, this indicates great benefit in many matters, such as marriage, work, healing, money, dreams, and others. Among the many signs of good-looking dough is its color. White color indicates goodness and food. If an unmarried girl sees dough in her dream. This indicates her closeness to God Almighty, and also indicates her good reputation among people. And if she sees in her dream that she is eating dough that has not been baked yet; This indicates that she is wise, as she is careful in her choices and decisions and does not prefer to rush in her affairs. If a girl sees in her dream that the dough she ate was sweet in taste. Because it is intended for making cakes and sweets. This indicates good luck and joy

title: The 100 most important interpretations of seeing cheese in a dream

preview.html: Cheese in a dreamCheese is a food made from milk that has many health benefits, and many people are interested in searching for different meanings of cheese in a dream. Cheese in a dreamThe following are the most important meanings of cheese in a dream: The interpretation of a person’s dream of cheese is the amount of joy and comfort that the dreamer will feel in his life. Al-Nabulsi believes that cheese in a dream means “contracts,” that is, a marriage contract or a contract between two people or a group of people to perform a certain work. In general, cheese in a dream represents health and safety if the dreamer is a peaceful person. If the cheese in a dream is soft, this is a good sign. However, it is better than dryness, just as the interpretation of white cheese is better than yellow cheese. Cheese in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin was able to give many interpretations of cheese in a dream, the most important of which can be clarified through the following: Buying cheese in a dream symbolizes money. Halal coming from legitimate sources. If you see in your dream that you are offering cheese to someone, this is a sign of the love that unites you with your family. And dreaming of seeing dried cheese means corruption of morals, distance from God, anguish and sadness. If the sick person dreams in his dream that he is eating cheese, this is a sign On the end of illness and the arrival of health. In general, Ibn Sirin believes that cheese in a dream indicates the justice and mercy of God Almighty. An unmarried girl who dreams of cheese in a dream should rejoice because she will soon get engaged and marry a good and pious man. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Interpretation website Dreams on the Internet from Google. Cheese in a dream for a single woman. A girl who sees cheese in a dream shows her failure in the job assigned to her and she must care more and work hard and persevere. If a single girl dreams that she is eating cheese in a dream, this is a sign that she is a responsible person who can succeed without having to Helping others. If the cheese that the girl ate in the dream was white and rotten, this indicates her sins and transgressions and the necessity of returning from committing those sins. A single woman’s dream of eating white cheese greatly indicates God’s mercy and love for her, especially if the cheese tastes good. And in If the cheese is impressively white, then this is news about her upcoming marriage to a wealthy man who will make her happy. Cheese in a dream for a married woman. There are many interpretations of cheese in a dream for a married woman, and they are as follows: Eating cheese in a dream for a married woman with others indicates grace and extreme wealth, as well as Evidence that they share happiness and contentment together. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating white cheese, this symbolizes her life full of joy and happiness. And when a woman sees in a dream that she is taking cheese from someone, this is a sign of the comfort that she will have to bring a source of livelihood into. Her life provides her and her family with prosperity and well-being. Seeing a married woman eating bread and cheese in a dream symbolizes that she will go through a short period of fatigue, illness, or lack of money, but this will soon pass. Cheese in a dream for a pregnant woman Imam Nabulsi says that

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad: A person believes that traveling abroad is one of the things that some young people want to learn or work, and many people dream of traveling to enjoy seeing different and new sights and see the dream of traveling abroad. From his actual trip immediately and that he will move to a different and new place. Are the repercussions of the dream about traveling abroad related to this or are there other things that could happen in the dreamer’s life? We follow the details of this vision below. Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad: It can be said that a dream about traveling abroad can indicate good or bad for a person, and this is determined according to the apparent circumstances, including the person’s condition and the means he used to travel, in addition to the details of how he travelled. He took next to the place he went to in his dream. If joyful details are available in the dream, such as traveling by plane and heading to a place that a person finds wonderful without running into crises on the way, then this is a sign of great comfort and having happy things in the coming days. Man. Jurists argue that using most means of transportation represents luck and comfort for the dreamer, such as a car or plane, etc., while if you travel on foot and face a lot of pain and danger, the interpretation is related to the many debts that haunt you and the problems that always appear to you because of their weight. And the distress of its owners.Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin says: If someone finds that he is traveling abroad and the place he went to is better than the one in which he lives now, this is interpreted by the great change that is occurring in his affairs and is full of joy and comfort. For him, while if you travel and find the place where you end up scary and strange, the meaning stipulates that you will struggle in difficult situations in the next few days. The psychological state of a person in a dream is one of the things that accurately determines interpretations of dreams. If he travels abroad and feels happy, this indicates That the changes in his life will be severe in terms of success, while if it is. Bad feelings overcome and the person is unhappy, and this indicates that his praiseworthy circumstances will unfortunately change for the worse. To know Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet... You will find everything you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad for single people Ibn Shaheen appears That when an unmarried girl drives the train to travel and heads to another place she wants a lot, in fact, the dream indicates that she is very confident in herself and constantly faces bad situations that she can expose herself to. Yes, and therefore she will be very close to her dreams. One of the meanings of the law is that the girl embarks on a ship to travel abroad, and this indicates the great generosity of her friends and the kind treatment she receives from them, in addition to focusing on the issue of work. Therefore, she will be in a high position with her diligence. Interpretation of a dream about traveling abroad for a married woman: Sometimes a married woman travels abroad in her dream and takes a plane to reach a country where

title: Find out the interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving you money

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead man gives you money. Seeing a dead person giving you money in a dream shows the kindness and sustenance that fills the dreamer’s life. But what about the interpretation of seeing a dead man taking money from a living person? Interpretation of a dream about a dead man gives you money. Many of the most important interpretive scholars said that seeing the dead gives you money. In a dream, it is a promising vision to change all the affairs and life of the dreamer for the better in the coming periods and that he will achieve many wonderful successes that will give him a great position in society in the coming periods. Many of the most important interpretation experts have also explained that seeing the dead gives you money during the dreamer’s sleep as evidence. However, he will enter into many successful projects that will return to him a lot of profits and money in the coming periods. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving you money according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a dead person giving you money in a dream means that the dreamer, being a sincere person, does many things. Good deeds that increase his standing before his Lord. Better in the next few days. The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a dead person gives you money in a dream, indicating that the dreamer will achieve many wonderful successes that will make him a special person and a word will be heard in his workplace. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving you money by Ibn Shaheen. With many things you will make it. To feel great joy and happiness in the coming periods. The scholar Ibn Shaheen also confirmed that seeing a dead man gives you money while the dreamer is sleeping, a sign of the collapse of all the problems and worries that dominated his life in the previous days and replacing them with days full of joy and happiness. title: Learn about the interpretation of Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream on the authority of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Al-Fatihah in Al-Manamourah Al-Fatihah is called the Seven of the Seconds, and seeing it in a dream is good news and glad tidings for the dreamer, and it has many good connotations. There have been many interpretations of scholars regarding the smells that afflict the dreamer when he sees Surah Al-Fatihah, but they all agreed that it is an abundance of sustenance and great blessings for those who see it, and in the article we explain all the details related to it. To Al-Fatihah in a dream. Al-Fatihah in a dream. Interpretation scholars have explained to us the many interpretations of seeing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, which we present to you as follows: Imam Al-Sadiq says that the interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Fatihah is interpreted as success and prosperity. Seeing Al-Fatihah in a dream indicates that there are many good things. Which will come to man and will open the doors of all good things to him. Sheikh Nabulsi tells us that Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream is good news that God will answer your prayers and accept your good deeds. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and write an online dream interpretation site. Al-Fatihah in a dream by Ibn Sirini presents it to us The scholar Ibn Sirin has several interpretations of seeing Al-Fatihah in a dream, including: Seeing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream indicates many good things and happy beginnings that await him. Among Ibn Sirin’s sayings is that Al-Fatihah in a dream indicates blessings and the dreamer’s closeness to his religion and keeping the obligatory duties. When a sick person sees Al-Fatihah In a dream, this is a sign that, God willing, he will recover, and the disease will leave him and his condition will improve. If one of the verses of Surat Al-Fatihah is seen in a dream, it indicates the long life that the dreamer will live. If a young man sees Al-Fatihah in his dream, this means that he will soon be associated with a girl of good character. Al-Fatihah in An unmarried woman’s dream: Commentators point out that Surah Al-Fatihah in an unmarried woman’s dream is a good sign and contains a lot of good news. We get to know them in the following: When an unmarried girl sees Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream, it is a sign of God’s response to her prayers and the fulfillment of the desire that she always prayed to the Creator to answer her hope. If the girl is going through a difficult period of problems and she sees Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, this is a sign. To approach comfort and resolve the crises that she has been exposed to recently. When an unmarried woman gets married and sees Al-Fatihah in her dream, this is clear evidence of the nearness of her marriage to her fiancé, who has good morals and good behavior among people. Al-Fatihah in a dream for a married woman. In the event that a married woman sees Al-Fatihah in a dream, This indicates the many benefits that it will bring and the abundance that God will send to the family through the husband. If a woman sees Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream and has disagreements with her husband, this indicates that these disagreements will be resolved and that her life will improve, God willing. When a married woman faces a difficult decision She is afraid to choose, and she sees Al-Fatihah in a dream, this is news of safety and that the Lord will help her reach the best possible. When a woman makes her children memorize Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, this indicates her good upbringing and her great interest in her family.

title: Interpretation of seeing glass in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing glass in a dream is one of the visions that many people are concerned about and they are trying to find an explanation for this dream, although many interpretive scholars have seen many positive interpretations of this dream. With the vision that is recognized, therefore, when the vision needs interpretation, you must consult a sheikh who has the ability to interpret and ask the necessary questions to know all the details. See also: The project in a dream. Interpretation of seeing glass in a dream. In general, the interpretation of seeing glass in a dream indicates sadness and anxiety. In the dreamer's life, the amount of sadness depends on the amount of glass in the dream and the size of the glass. If the cup is large, this indicates that the worry and sadness are great, and if the cup is small, this indicates some sorrows that go away after a short period. Just like a healthy glass when you see it in a dream. In addition to the fact that the color of the glass in the dream leads to a difference in interpretation, the green color of the glass indicates acceptable worship, while the red glass indicates love that ends in evil, and the yellow glass indicates A fleeting disease. See also: Backgrounds in a dream: Seeing glass in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of seeing glass in a dream and that it is very clear, this indicates that the dreamer achieves his ambitions and improves his circumstances. Also, if you dream of plates, cups, and plates from a wedding, this indicates However, the dreamer was able to solve some of the difficulties and problems he was facing. In addition, Ibn Sirin believes that seeing glass in a dream indicates continued success and positive changes in a person’s life, because it indicates good luck. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Seeing glass In a dream for a man: The interpretation of seeing glass in a dream for a man, and the glass is green in color, shows the good morals and good behavior that a person has among people. Just as when the dreamer sees glass breaking in his hands, this indicates differences and judgments between the man and his wife. In addition to seeing the sale of glass in a dream and receiving it. Dirhams or jewelry, in contrast, this indicates sins and transgressions committed by the dreamer. See also: Seeing pins in a dream Seeing glass in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees broken glass in a dream, this indicates the sadness and disappointment that the girl is suffering from. As for seeing Broken glass in a dream, this indicates the problems and difficulties that the girl is trying to fix. Seeing glass in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing glass in a dream for a married woman indicates the worries and sorrows that the woman suffers from. As for seeing a repaired glass in a married woman’s dream, this indicates stability. Which she lives in with her husband. See also: Piano in a dream Seeing broken glass in a dream Seeing someone in a dream that he is breaking glass, this means that this person is suffering from some discomfort.

title: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream in detail. Prayer is one of the pillars of Islam and the most important thing that links a servant to his Lord, and prayer is linked to other qualities of a person, such as his integrity, behavior, and dedication to his work. Daily tasks and make him feel comfortable and calm, he gets it from this dream, so in this article today we will learn the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin says that a dream about prayer is one of the visions promising an answer to the priest’s prayer, and on the way It is good for her. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will fulfill the promise he made to himself. If a person dreams that he is praying the dawn prayer, then his dream indicates the fulfillment of his wishes. As for the Friday prayer in the dream, it is good news of the dreamer’s close proximity. The Eid al-Fitr prayer in a dream indicates the arrival of many... Foods for the dreamer. The Eid al-Adha prayer means that the dreamer will be able to pay all his debts. The dream of performing the prayer in it is a sign that the dreamer is preparing for something new that will happen in his life. In the dream of kneeling in prayer, it indicates the dreamer’s remorse and repentance for his bad behavior. Among the auspicious dreams is the dream of prayer. And worship, because it symbolizes the dreamer’s near salvation from his debts and worries. Whoever sees in his dream that he has completed his prayer and surrendered, his dreams indicate that there is a loved one who will return from his exile. If a person dreams that he is praying on the Day of Resurrection, then the vision here is a warning to him of the necessity of returning to God. And repentance to Him. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. The scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that whoever sees himself in a dream praying inside the graves, this indicates that God Almighty will satisfy his need and give him money and sustenance. If a person dreams that he is praying and supplicating, this means that God will bless him with offspring. The righteous. As for crying during prayer in a dream, it is good for the dreamer to change his condition for the better, and to save him from his sorrows and worries. And whoever dreams that he wants to pray and does not find the place to pray, this indicates that there are things in his life that cause him severe confusion. Among the dreams that portend Dream of praying until sunset; Because this means that the dreamer is committing disobedience and disobedience. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen And from Ibn Shaheen’s point of view: Whoever dreams of prostrating for a long period of time in prayer, this indicates the fulfillment of his desires and dreams. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is kneeling for a long time, this means that he will repent. To God, and turn away from the path of desires, and abandon all the sins and disobedience he had committed. Whoever dreams that he performs ablution and then prays, his dreams indicate that his goals will be achieved and his prayers will be answered. One of the most promising visions is the dream of asking for forgiveness in prayer, because it symbolizes that God will grant The dreamer has good offspring and achieves whatever he wants. Whoever sees himself praying with a group of men and women, his vision indicates that he will take a leadership position. Whoever sees in his dream that he prayed and the number of rak’ahs increased, or the number of rak’ahs decreased, this indicates that he is suffering from an injustice that befalls him. Dreaming that he is praying in a place full of blood is evidence that the dreamer is committing many sins. Seeing that the prayer is not fulfilled indicates the dreamer’s inability to achieve his goal.

Seeing that the prayer is not fulfilled indicates the dreamer’s inability to achieve his goal.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a sick person in a dream. There are many diseases that affect humans, where the disease is a disease that interferes in the body and causes damage ranging from mild, medium, and severe, as the body loses some of it due to the disease. Its functions, and thus it becomes difficult for a person to live a normal life. Seeing an illness in a dream or seeing a person afflicted with an illness. This dream certainly has many important meanings, which we will learn about in this article. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person in a dream. A dream: This vision often expresses the presence of a dear person facing a problem or a big problem, from which it is very difficult to escape quietly, and the interpretation is as follows: This vision expresses that the dreamer himself is exposed to a serious and difficult problem and crisis. Therefore, he could not find a suitable solution to it, so in this Difficult situation: He needs help and does not want to ask for it from a stranger, but the deterioration and aggravation of his condition has become clear. Also, this dream in the dream indicates the presence of a material substance that controls the dreamer’s life. It can be interpreted that the material is the main driver for that person in his life dealings. In The condition of the dreamer falling ill where he can no longer make any movement or is unable to speak. This could be a sign that this person's morals and behavior have changed dramatically. In addition, he will distance himself from all his acquaintances and friends, but will also denounce them. Some interpreters also believe that this dream symbolizes the dreamer enjoying good health and prosperity. In addition, his body is free of the diseases he believes, so he is a man who cares about his physical condition and physical health. However, the dream may symbolize the deterioration of conditions and matters in the recent period and thus an increase in crises. And problems. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about seeing cancer in a dream. Seeing someone I know sick for single people. There are many factors that control arriving at a healthy and clear interpretation of this vision, such as the nature of the relationship between the patient and the person who sees it, and we will learn about the interpretation of a single person’s dream. . Followed by: A disease that causes a rash or can negatively affect the skin. It symbolizes the bad reputation of the young man who recently proposed to her. While if an unmarried woman sees the person she wants in reality, she will scratch his skin in a dream. There is no doubt that this symbolizes that God Almighty will honor him with abundant provision and marry her, and God knows best. But if the girl herself is suffering from an illness, this indicates that she will not be happy with this marriage because she will suffer from many problems. In the event that the unmarried girl visits him and reassures him that he will return to his senses. Certainly, this indicates Great love, feelings and tenderness in her heart for that person. While if an unmarried woman sees a man in her dream and he is seriously ill, she cannot move much. This can be a sign of salvation and the end of her relationship with the person who was very important to her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing SickSee also: Dream interpretation of seeing a serious illness in a dream M

title: Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dream is one of the topics for which there is a very large search on the Internet, as some people see in a dream that they are carrying the Qur’an, reading the Qur’an, memorizing it, or buying it. But seeing the Qur’an and the Qur’an in general in a dream is one of the good visions that brings the dreamer a lot. Of good and good news, as the Qur’an comes to its family, its bearers, and those who are always around. Seeing goodness and blessing. Today the site presents the encyclopedia of Qur’anic interpretation in a dream and the signs and associations that this dream targets and which the dreamer can search for to find good in his life. Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dreamInterpretation of the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin presented many interpretations of seeing the Qur’an in a dream, as a dream The Qur’an is one of the common recurring dreams of many Muslims around the world. Ibn Sirin said: Seeing the Qur’an in a dream is good and a blessing. He also gave explanations for seeing the Qur’an as a gift in a dream, where he said: It is a blessing, goodness, and an increase in money, as Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the Qur’an is a gift in a dream. Made of gold, good news in that. Proximity to the abundance of sustenance, wealth, purity, and God’s satisfaction with abundant provision. The scholar Ibn Sirin also interpreted seeing the Qur’an in a dream as a high status in the dreamer. He also interpreted seeing the green Qur’an in a dream as a sign of the imminent visit to the Sacred House of God for Hajj or Umrah. Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Imam Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing the Qur’an in a dream in several ways, as he said that seeing it in a dream indicates the wisdom and knowledge that the dreamer possesses. The heirs of the prophets on earth. As for the evil of sight, Ibn Shaheen said: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is burning the Qur’an or burning something from the Qur’an, this indicates the extent of the dreamer’s corruption and lack of faith. And hypocrisy. Religion. As for the vision of a person reading the Qur’an on the pulpit, this vision according to Ibn Shaheen is interpreted as one of the dreams that indicate goodness, meaning that the Prophet will prevail over the people, and that God will grant it. He has the command of his servants, and he will be given command and leadership if he is qualified to do so. Sometimes the dreamer sees that he is selling the Qur’an in a dream, and this dream was interpreted by Ibn Shaheen as a loss, humiliation, and a great loss. Likewise, if a person dreams that he opens the Qur’an to read it and does not find the Qur’an written inside the Qur’an, this indicates On loss.Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she is opening the Qur’an and reading it, then this vision is a good vision, as it shows the happy events that await this girl in the future and that success and best wishes will come. True soon. If a girl sees that someone gave her a copy of the Qur’an or the Qur’an, this indicates the imminence of her engagement to a person with morals and religion, and the marriage will be quick and she will enjoy her life with him and be hers. The nice husband she wants. Interpretation of the Qur’an in a married woman’s dream: A married woman’s dream of the Holy Qur’an is one of the dreams whose interpretation comes in its best form. If a married woman dreams of the Qur’an, then the interpretation of her dream is that she will live alive.
